channel.title: DDOS attacks
channel.description:
About 2 weeks ago i was attacked. Reading thru apache logs it 1 big botnet and 1 smaller about a 20 to 1 ratio.
Lawls accts: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=8226 http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=265789 http://www.servbit.org/priv/profile.php?id=6
IRC Staff has failed a leadership test. I posted IRC logs in the cm. No one has been banned from irc. The IRC Staff wants
The IRC Staff member Thug Life opinion: [code] 00(05:20:57) 07(15ruler07) the big reason to ban him is he is attacking other peoples sites (05:21:12) 07(15Thug-life07) there is no proof in that though (05:21:22) 07(15Thug-life07) till you find where he is actually attacking from (05:21:29) 07(15Thug-life07) if its actually him 00(05:21:30) 07(15ruler07) we both know we will never be absolutly sure (05:22:03) 07(15Thug-life07) well would you put someone up for the death penetly (sp?) if you wasnt 100% sure they killed that person? [/code] In other words I need 100% certainity before a ban.
Yesterday eFAK Joshy was in IRC. This is the Joshy that used kibs servers and did not pay kib, did scams, ddosed mopar. The IRC Staff would not ban him.
Some irc tidbits: [code] (23:43:02) 07@frank_: they prolly didnt even hack it (23:43:05) 07Speljohan_: mak den Joshy (23:43:18) 07Joshy: nah it would fall (23:43:22) 07Joshy: without something to bring users (23:43:24) 07@frank_: remember that last time Joshy made a forum (23:43:29) 07@frank_: and scammed everyone (23:43:33) 07Speljohan_: l0ol (23:43:36) 07Speljohan_: just do dis: (23:43:43) 07Joshy: 1.5 users franko (23:43:47) 07Speljohan_: lie about havin autorune2 (23:43:49) 07Joshy: not bad for a scam site (23:43:49) 07Speljohan_: den scam (23:43:50) 07Speljohan_: all (23:43:58) 07Joshy: already done it Speljohan_ =/ (23:44:02) 07Speljohan_: rifk (23:44:03) 07Joshy: i was ar2 admin (23:44:07) 07Speljohan_: pull a second raw [/code]
IRC Staff member promoting ddosing: [code] (17:16:31) 07frank_: just ddos ikiliki until the faggot stops dosing us omg [/code]
runelocus was hit with a big ddos attack over the past couple of days. Ikiliki[God] blamed moparscape skiddies.
Number of Unique ips that hit rscheata.net 522, that hit runelocus.com 495, number of unique shared in both 72 So the person hitting runelocus over the past few days is the same one that hit me 2 weeks ago.
Info about the ddos on this site. A person called kBr was hitting this site for revenge i believe for the attacks from the people in the IRC. Yesterday he was told to stop after Spel talked to Ikiliki[God].
Current Status: [code] (15:35:07) (ruler) what do you knwo about the attacks on mopar (15:35:15) (ruler) spel mentioned its kbr (15:35:28) (ruler) he said he negoicated with you (15:35:29) (Ikiliki[God]) At the beginning it was this kBr guy I believe (15:35:31) (Ikiliki[God]) We weren't sure about it (15:35:41) (Ikiliki[God]) but after he said he stopped, I were able to load the status page for a while. (15:36:04) (Ikiliki[God]) The attacks right now are probably Jeebles, nmopar and some rawt dawg or something (15:36:18) (Ikiliki[God]) They're attacking every single private server community except their own (15:36:28) (Ikiliki[God]) Thinking they will become huge. (15:36:44) (Ikiliki[God]) They're using T_X's botnet, and therefore not attacking me right now. (15:36:57) (Ikiliki[God]) Since T_X uses to visit my site a lot these days [/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 20, 2008, 01:32:03 PM[/size][hr]IP Lists
http://rafb.net/p/t4LxFK35.html
1st mine 2nd rune locus 3rd shared

item.title: DDOS attacks
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Thug-life, post:43, topic:221457”]I originally put Barrage_time on the forbid list thinking he was this ‘barrage`’ who spammed the network with runelocus shit, then i removed it afterwards he came into the channel, started trolling with moparscape shit after we told him to go to #moparscape around 5 - 6 times after a few kicks, he then decided to start trolling the channel so i banned him. (Not to mention he was banned on the old channel on dairc for doing the same thing)

If his nick is on the forbid list again then its obviously because of the latest database reverts, and about alley? I don’t know - i’ve had nothing to do with him.[/quote]Alley have never done anything, so he does not deserve ban.

Read full topic

item.title: DDOS attacks
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:35, topic:221457”]Ruler, have you ever taken into consideration that lawl is a jackass?
I’ve seen him claim multiple attacks on mainstream sites(runescape, etc)…which means you can’t believe him when he says anything.

I don’t believe Ikiliki is that smart.

As far as I know, he knows a bit of html, and I don’t think is java skills are as godly as he claims they are.[/quote]
Ikiliki’s Java skills are terrible, he does not have the skills to do anything with it. As for his HTML ability, he knows basic HTML. By basic, I mean slim to nothing.

casey.:

Lusfr_ made his own c++ botnet, or so I’ve heard.

Lusfr_ would not have the skills to create the botnet in any language. From what I know super_ wrote the botnet and gave it to Lusfr_ and asked him to take credits to take the hatrid etc from super_

My point:
Ban everyone with something to do with Runelocus, as if they’re a member of that forum, they obviously do not like Moparisthebest. For the people that wish to be able to visit both, they should be required to say why they want to, and be allowed to at the discretion of the staff.

Read full topic

Comcast
2008-07-21

My internet was shut down earlier today due to hosting my IRC with bots. Apparently, residential services for Comcast does not allow you to host anything at all, but I'm going to keep this website up, hoping my internet won't go out again.

In the meantime, check out Runesoft. They seem to be getting popular.

ruler:

How deep does the rabbit trail go?

item.title: DDOS attacks
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

Niall:

[quote author=ruler link=topic=290727.msg2344826#msg2344826 date=1216690634]I believe you are out of your element. You have provided no actual hard evidence, no irc logs, no ip logs, just your political opinions.

Ok, fair enough(scroll down for IRC logs), but seriously, why, how even would I have IP logs? I’m not the one being attacked.

Jul 20 19:29:23 <Ikiliki[God]> Niall
Jul 20 19:29:26 <Ikiliki[God]> so i heard
Jul 20 19:29:35 <Ikiliki[God]> It’s Jeebles attacking mopar, dodian and google
Jul 20 19:29:43 <Ikiliki[God]> He’s trying to get down all private server communities
Jul 20 19:29:45 <Ikiliki[God]> except his own
Jul 20 19:30:04 I heard from johan
Jul 20 19:31:30 <Ikiliki[God]> Gander, nmopal and rat dawg to be exact
Jul 20 19:31:41 <Ikiliki[God]> They were attacking us today
Jul 20 19:31:45 <Ikiliki[God]> they use T_X’s botnet

Jul 21 22:16:38 <Ikiliki[God]> lol Nile
Jul 21 22:16:42 <Ikiliki[God]> you saw tx’s ‘big’ botnet?
Jul 21 22:16:45 <Ikiliki[God]> I’m on his irc atm
Jul 21 22:16:45 <Ikiliki[God]> l0l
Jul 21 22:16:53 <Ikiliki[God]> 9 bots
Jul 21 22:16:54 <Ikiliki[God]> l0l
Jul 21 22:16:58 <Ikiliki[God]> Niall
Jul 21 22:16:59 <Ikiliki[God]> highlight
Jul 21 22:16:59 <Ikiliki[God]> etc.

If you’re incapable of reading this, Ikiliki has access to T_x’s botnet, which he says was attacking mitb. 9 Bots won’t bring down mitb, so either he’s bullshitting, or he really is doing it.

Update, a little birdie told me the server/port to T_x’s botnet, and on godirc:

* Ikiliki[God] (win@is.win) has joined #google
<Butthead> [Ikiliki[God]] <Greeny> Thug-life u better still be anti-moparscape
* Butthead sets mode +q #google Ikiliki[God]
* Butthead gives channel operator status to Ikiliki[God]
<Ikiliki[God]> l0l dude
<Lusfr_[Baked]> [18:57:52] <Nile> Lusfr_[Baked]: I'm in ur chans
<Lusfr_[Baked]> [18:57:56] <Nile> lukin at ur bots
<Lusfr_[Baked]> [18:57:56] <Nile> etc
<Lusfr_[Baked]> brl. gp oycnn nrrtcb ay Y{Q-o xry;
<Lusfr_[Baked]> nope
<Lusfr_[Baked]> ur looking at T_X's bots
<Ikiliki[God]> lol Nile 
<Ikiliki[God]> ur not lookin' at his
<Ikiliki[God]> cuz u n other #mopar r always saying every single net is Lusfr_[Baked]'s
<Ikiliki[God]> but its no
<Ikiliki[God]> t
<Lusfr_[Baked]> Ikiliki[God]: o ye
<Lusfr_[Baked]> l0l
<Nile> Ikiliki[God]: it's funny
<Nile> jeebles is on the irc server too
<Nile> you told me jeebles is attacking mitb among other communities with t_x's botnet
<Ikiliki[God]> Nile
<Nile> I don't see more than 9 bots in any channels I can see on /list
<Ikiliki[God]> thats what I thought
<Ikiliki[God]> until I had a chat with jeebles
<Ikiliki[God]> T_X lied
<Lusfr_[Baked]> Nile: it's hidden
<Ikiliki[God]> trying to get himself outa trouble
<Ikiliki[God]> btw there's a hidden chan somewhere
<Lusfr_[Baked]> we can't find
<Lusfr_[Baked]> :(
<Aff> is this a group orgy?
<Ikiliki[God]> ive been trying tons

Someone is attacking mitb and hasn’t fessed up yet.

Now, for a more urgent matter, information is leaking out of the community section, anyone caught doing so will be banned.[/quote]
Why dont you tell us the server/port to T_x’s botnet?

I am guilty of leaking info out of the cm section. I was not aware of a policy that information here can not be shared. People say what i post in the cm in IRC and all laugh at it. politics…

I have shown posts to regex many times. I believe regex deserves CM.

I have showed Ikiliki[God] many cm posts during the length of the investigation, http://www.impboxes.com/lawl/ .

[quote=“ruler, post:14, topic:221457”]According to source at runeL****

http://irc.not-a-bot.net:1337 has a bot net running on it.

We got someone on skype to leave a message on his hosts phone.[/quote]
Is this the network you are talking about ^

Read full topic

item.title: DDOS attacks
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Lothy:

Ikiliki attacks your site, which leads you to think that this community’s members are involved. He then attacks his own site, playing the innocent victim. Finally he uses this to instigate attacks against this website, by saying the moparscape userbase is to blame.

I don’t believe Ikiliki is that smart.

Read full topic

item.title: DDOS attacks
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:20, topic:221457”]Provide proof that lawl is doing it and I’ll personally ban him(and gline on the IRC).

As for Ikiliki, he says that Jeebles is attacking all rsps communities using T_x’s botnet, however someone confided in me(which is why I won’t say his name) that Lusfr_ has access to T_x’s botnet, and Ikiliki has mentioned to me that he has access, not ownership, of a botnet.

Now ruler, I’m going to ‘pull a ruler’(not by UD’s definition either), Ikiliki has access to T_x’s botnet through Lusfr_ (which I should mention is o:line + service admin on IRC + administrator on forums), and Ikiliki is attacking the RSPS communities resulting in someone attacking runelocus to stop the attacks on mitb. [size=1pt]Prove me wrong.[/size]

This seems perfectly feasible for me, and if it’s true, it could be Ikiliki attacking rscheata not lawl.[/quote]
That does sound feasible, having read the logs. That would also explain how Ikiliki created that list of ips that were attacking his box.
Who knows, maybe he attacked himself to throw ruler off the scent - it’s the perfect way to get away with it. Who would attack their own website? Simple answer - someone who wants be seen as a victim, rather than the perpetrator.
I think I’m onto something here, too.

As for the chat logs from Joshy, I’m afraid that I can’t take them seriously given the fact that I now know it’s the same Joshy that came onto freenode/botnetted people/scammed/etc.

EDIT: And before you dismiss this as something impossible, know that Ikiliki is bitter over being banned. We’re also aware that you have been relaying information from this forum section to him (he knew about the topic yz85racer created, for a start).
The above is simply a hunch, much like yours.
Only I see it as more likely that mine is correct - Ikiliki attacks your site, which leads you to think that this community’s members are involved. He then attacks his own site, playing the innocent victim. Finally he uses this to instigate attacks against this website, by saying the moparscape userbase is to blame.

Read full topic

item.title: DDOS attacks
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Like the late, great mopman said: “A ddos is a ddos” - I hate to bring it back up, but as you are complaining about me bringing up something that happened two years ago i’ll bring something up that happened recently and is infact still supported on your site - clogging up a phone number which is basically denying service to that line.

I have no problem with people being banned for ddosing aslong as you, ruler don’t get away with what you and your whole community are doing.

Read full topic

item.title: DDOS attacks
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:20, topic:221457”]Provide proof that lawl is doing it and I’ll personally ban him(and gline on the IRC).

As for Ikiliki, he says that Jeebles is attacking all rsps communities using T_x’s botnet, however someone confided in me(which is why I won’t say his name) that Lusfr_ has access to T_x’s botnet, and Ikiliki has mentioned to me that he has access, not ownership, of a botnet.

Now ruler, I’m going to ‘pull a ruler’(not by UD’s definition either), Ikiliki has access to T_x’s botnet through Lusfr_ (which I should mention is o:line + service admin on IRC + administrator on forums), and Ikiliki is attacking the RSPS communities resulting in someone attacking runelocus to stop the attacks on mitb. [size=1pt]Prove me wrong.[/size]

This seems perfectly feasible for me, and if it’s true, it could be Ikiliki attacking rscheata not lawl.[/quote]
The proof is the irc logs on #mopar 2 weeks ago when lawl said he was attacking my site and my site was done, he said right around the time the site went dark. Further proof is he has the technical knowledge, http://www.servbit.org/priv/index.php / http://www.servbit.org/.

The additional statments come from Joshy who links c|p and lawl as the ones involoved with the botnet. c|p adds alot to the technical skills.

The proof is the ip logs of the attack on Ikiliki verse the attack on me 2 weeks ago. The ip logs indicate that it is the same botnet. Lawl was the only one that took credit for he attack. The only people that talked about the attack were on mopar irc. Many people in the mopar irc cheered on the attacks and gave rep to lawl.

The attacks one this site I noticed on saturday, i called mopar immedatly, i further investigated on IRC. It was uncovered that Ikiliki site was attacked many days before that saturday, when he finally got back online he blamed moparscape skiddies. It sounds to me people took revenege by attacking this site.

As for saying that Ikiliki might be the one that attacked rscheata 2 weeks, that further degrades the likelyhood of your position. The facts are I had only talked to him on #moparscape irc months before.

I believe you are out of your element. You have provided no actual hard evidence, no irc logs, no ip logs, just your political opinions.

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 21, 2008, 02:56:47 PM[/size][hr][quote=“jme, post:24, topic:221457”]Anyone else remember when ruler redirected a ddos attack to hit moparisthebest.com?[/quote]
The ddos that was redirected was one that orignated from the #mopar irc. The members in their were talking about it and did it. This is over 2 years ago. Thanks for the memories…

Acutally that adds more evidence to my evidence…

Thug-life:

But the question still stands Niall, if we are banning people who ddos sites - should ruler not be banned too? (No im not just talking about the jagex shit).

So your relating something that happened over 2 years to things happeneing today.

[quote=“ruler, post:10, topic:5911”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=7950.msg84952#msg84952 date=1153702479]

The forum was only used for leaking impsoft bots.

What’d Mopar say about being an asshole, Ruler?
Also, that wasn’t my doing, so die.
You wouldn’t know either.
[/quote]
I don’t know what mopar said about me, but it would not surpise me. For one he never removed my aryan scripts. Star was not allowed do it bc mopar requested him not to. Mopar dosn’t respect me. He didn’t remove my bot till he was forced by a ddos from nerice. Not to mention the ddos that i recieved from newbiehacker which hit first. Also mopar promised me that he would ban the cracker but didn’t bc the cracker was on his staff.

You on the other hand have done X100 more:
distrubting leaking my sbot3 scripts.
then helping admin a site that sold my scripts at a reduced cost (tonsofscripts.com)
Then finally you see the light and actually purschase the scripts then you tried to charge back.
leaking aryan scripts
sending them in pms
then you create pwndproductions.com and bam their is my bot (UBI), never removed…

Frankly, i dont know what you have contributed but to disuade people from contributing.[/quote]

Lets be honest, you really want to open up things that happened 2 years ago. You will find alot of people if they were banned we would have a community of people that contribute instead of leech.

Read full topic
